com.sadakatsu.clue.cards

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sadakatsu.clue.cards.Card
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Room, Suspect, Weapon

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    The Card class represents a Card from the game of Clue. There are three types of Cards -- Suspect, Weapon, and Room -- which have their own subclasses.
    Author:
    Joseph A. Craig

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Card(java.lang.String name)
      Instantiates a new Card with the passed name.

      static Card from(java.lang.String abbreviation)
      Finds and returns the Card whose abbreviation matches the passed abbreviation when ignoring case.

      The two-letter abbreviation for the Card used in server-player messaging.
      static java.util.List<Card> getCards()
      All the Cards in Clue.

      The full name of the Card.

      • from

        public static Card from(java.lang.String abbreviation)
        Finds and returns the Card whose abbreviation matches the passed abbreviation when ignoring case.
        Parameters:
        abbreviation - The abbreviation of the Card to get.
        Returns:
        The Card instance if the abbreviation is valid, null otherwise.
